scripts.shared: npx token-transformer tokens.json tokens/all.json shared/core,shared/semantic,shared/composition/atoms,shared/composition/molecules,shared/composition/layout --expandTypography=true && npm run clean && node build-shared.js
scripts.theme: npx token-transformer tokens.json tokens/theme.json shared/core,shared/semantic,shared/composition/atoms,shared/composition/molecules,shared/composition/layout,theme/a/semantic,theme/a/component,theme/a/core  shared/core,shared/semantic,shared/composition/atoms,shared/composition/molecules,shared/composition/layout --expandTypography=true  && npm run clean && node build-shared.js
scripts.test: npx token-transformer tokens.json tokens/all.json theme/a/core,theme/a/semantic,shared/core,shared/semantic,shared/composition/atoms,shared/composition/molecules,shared/composition/layout,tokens/theme/a,theme/a/core,theme/a/semantic,theme/a/component --expandTypography=true && npm run clean && node build-shared.js
scripts.theme:a: npx token-transformer tokens.json tokens/theme/a.json theme/a/core,theme/a/semantic,theme/a/component  --expandTypography=true && npm run clean && node build-theme-a.js
scripts.start: dotenv cross-var npx token-transformer tokens.json tokens/all.json $SET_SHARED --expandTypography=true
